name: Yun Jin
desc: Hem oyun yazarlığı hem de şarkı söyleme becerisine sahip ünlü bir Liyue opera sanatçısı. Tıpkı kendisi gibi zarif ve narin tarzı, türünün tek örneğidir.

voice.title: Merhaba
voice.desc: As the saying goes, you never truly know someone until you meet them in person, and at long last, I finally have the great honor of meeting you today. My name is Yun Jin, and I am humbled to be the director of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe. We have been performing at Heyu Tea House as of late, and we'd be honored to have you attend a performance sometime.

voice.title: Chat: Sensitive Topic
voice.desc: My waistband has been feeling a little snug these last couple of days... Methinks I perchance have overindulged...

voice.title: Chat: Relaxing
voice.desc: Ahhh... Yes, I shall spare myself the hair and makeup routine today, and happily idle my time away!

voice.title: Chat: Singing Opera
voice.desc: (Translated) How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: *gasp* D—Did you hear that? Whew, it really startled me!

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: (Translated) Fie! This cold shall be mine end!

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: What a sight to behold, the sun so warm and radiant...

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Good morning! The dew at dawn is perfect for brewing tea, so I made some for you. Drink up, and then we'll head off!

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: I'd like to indulge in a nap after lunch. Oh? ...You're not tired?

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Let's go listen to tonight's storytelling performance together. Liu Su's rendition of "Ring of Raining Blades" is most sublime!

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: There's a chill in the air tonight, so you mustn't stay out late. Good night!

voice.title: About Yun Jin: Schooling
voice.desc: My schooling started very early. In fact, my earliest memories are of my father teaching me to read. Despite my best efforts, my ability is not half of his. Enough to write operas, but compared to his level of erudition, I still have much to strive for.

voice.title: About Yun Jin: Opera Training
voice.desc: In her youth, my mother was a famous opera singer in Liyue Harbor, and I learned all the operas I know from her. But, you could never imagine how strict she was with me as a teacher. Thinking back on it now, I... *sigh* No, no, no, I'd rather not think about it at all.

voice.title: About Us: Opera Troupe
voice.desc: We have some grand performances coming up soon, and it just so happens that we have an opening for someone to play the part of a skilled swordfighter. I think you'd be a perfect match for the part. How about it? Would you like to join our troupe? We can even enjoy some tea together in between acts.

voice.title: About Us: Rock 'n' Roll
voice.desc: Huh? You like rock 'n' roll? Oh, that's great! I'll be sure to bring you along the next time I go out to see a show. And when I get back, I can just tell the senior troupe members that I went out to visit you... Hehe, that way, they won't have any reason to get on my case about going out.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc: Hmm? My Vision? Hehe, I suppose the Lord of Geo must be a fan of the opera. Perhaps the old man was so delighted with my performance that he decided to grant me a Vision.

voice.title: Something to Share: Drinks
voice.desc: One of my absolute favorite pastimes is trying out all kinds of new beverages. I've already tried all the sophisticated-sounding drinks that previous generations came up with — you know, like Pine Nectar Tea and Snow Blossom Tea. I'm beginning to worry that I'll run out of new drinks to try soon. You don't happen to have any recommendations, do you?

voice.title: Something to Share: Dreams
voice.desc: Sometimes, I just feel like casting off my opera costume and going traveling overseas. You know, to explore the outside world. For now, I'll need to keep working hard at what I'm doing, so someday that dream can come true.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: The chirping of the songbirds at daybreak always puts me in the best of moods.

voice.title: About Xinyan
voice.desc: The elders of the troupe are always harping on about rock 'n' roll being a bad influence. Needless to say, they never approve of me going to see Xinyan's shows. "It's for your own good," they say. Hmph, all it's really about is their inability to accept anything new. Whatever, those old fogies can't tell me what to do. I'm going to keep rocking out at Xinyan's gigs, every week, and that's that.

voice.title: About Hu Tao
voice.desc: Ah yes, Hu Tao. Very expressive face, and she has a sharp mind too — you can be discussing the most mundane thing in the world, and she'll always bring out a string of witty remarks. I admire her a lot. There's never a dull moment when you have friends like her around.

voice.title: About Zhongli
voice.desc: The customs of the opera are very particular, and are passed down from generation to generation. Sometimes I find that I only know the hows but not the whys behind what we do. But when speaking with Zhongli, it is abundantly evident that he knows the origins behind almost everything. Who wouldn't be delighted to have such a connoisseur in their audience?

voice.title: About Ningguang
voice.desc: The Tianquan is a big spender and has made several very generous donations to our troupe. I can only return her generosity by delivering my best possible performance.

voice.title: About Xingqiu
voice.desc: Oh, so you are also acquainted with Xingqiu? Haha, he is quite the clever one, and with a sharp wit as well. The moment you let your guard down, you're at risk of becoming the butt of one of his practical jokes... Don't say I didn't warn you.

voice.title: About Shenhe
voice.desc: I have long since known "The Divine Damsel of Devastation" inside out, back to front, but it was only very recently that I learned that the "divine damsel" in question is actually a real person. Life is full of strange twists sometimes! My only hope is that she can find true friendship and never be lonely again.

voice.title: About Keqing
voice.desc: I have yet to see the Yuheng ever attend an opera performance. Now that I think about it, whenever I happen to see her out on the street, she always seems to be in a great hurry.

voice.title: About Kaedehara Kazuha
voice.desc: Kaedehara Kazuha is among the many outlanders who enjoy Liyue opera. Whether it's an orchestral section or a percussive piece, he always sits there and listens quietly. Talk about great manners!

voice.title: More About Yun Jin: I
voice.desc: Many of the operas we've been performing recently are new ones that I wrote after assuming the directorship of the troupe. I suppose the fact that I can both write and sing my own material has contributed to my rising popularity in Liyue Harbor.

voice.title: More About Yun Jin: II
voice.desc: Per the tradition, actors must wrap their hair, put on full-face makeup and an elaborate costume, and make all sorts of other preparations before they take the stage. There's no doubt that an opera star in full attire looks spectacular, but achieving this look is frightfully exhausting. So I perform without hair and makeup whenever I have the option — and if I must perform in full dress, I try to select a costume that isn't too heavy. Fortunately, the good folks at Heyu Tea House are quite lenient with us. Otherwise, we'd be working ourselves to early graves.

voice.title: More About Yun Jin: III
voice.desc: At the start of my opera career, I have to say I did let the standing ovations from our audiences go to my head a little. It wasn't long before I developed a captious attitude... If I didn't like the script, or if the stage was too small, or if I thought there weren't enough people in the audience, I would refuse to perform. Looking back now, it was all terribly arrogant of me... my goodness. I shall never let myself become so vain again.

voice.title: More About Yun Jin: IV
voice.desc: Now that I think about it, the Yun-Han Opera Troupe has been under my leadership for quite some time now. Before taking it over, I only knew two things: how to write opera and how to perform it on stage. I never gave any thought to how to run a troupe. Becoming the troupe's director gave me a crash course in this unfamiliar area and I've experienced all the highs and lows of working with people along the way... Only now do I understand that life mirrors opera, just as opera reflects life.

voice.title: More About Yun Jin: V
voice.desc: Well you know, many of Liyue's legends are centered around stories of gods and the adepti, so most operas focus on the supernatural, too. A prime example would be "The Divine Damsel of Devastation," which we have been performing recently. Long-time opera fans adore this sort of material, but in this age of humanity, I would rather like to tell stories about ordinary people. Yes, how grand it would be to sing about the hopes and dreams of ordinary people for all to hear. I've never shared these thoughts with anyone before... Thank you for listening so patiently. I'm fortunate to have a close friend like you.

voice.title: Yun Jin's Hobbies
voice.desc: My hobbies? Well, opera, of course! It's what I truly love and it's what I will be pursuing for the rest of my life.

voice.title: Yun Jin's Troubles
voice.desc: *sigh* Well, as you can probably imagine, I always have to be mindful of what I eat and make sure I stay in shape. It's a shame, because the temptation to indulge in all the tasty delicacies the city has to offer is just as strong to me as to anyone else...

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Tianshu Meat, Black-Back Perch Stew, Cured Pork Dry Hotpot... Oh, I just want them all! Unfortunately, I basically never get to eat such things, but... um, if you don't mind me asking... Can you cook any of those dishes?

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Every day's the same... Stir-Fried Shrimp, day in and day out. No matter how they prepare it, it always tastes the same. Ugh, ghastly! I really can't stand it anymore...

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Oh, so today's your birthday? Well, I wouldn't know how to throw you a feast if I tried... so how about I sing you a song? For you alone, an audience of one. So... what song would you like to hear me sing? The choice is yours.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc: As the saying goes: "Achievement in a field is the result of how hard you are willing to work at it, not how much you enjoy it."

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc: It looks like all my rigorous training is finally paying off.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc: I began my training in the art of the spear hoping to enhance my performance in stage combat. I stuck with it hoping to master the techniques of self-defense. Today, it looks like I have finally achieved both of these goals.

voice.title: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc: The art of the spear is a vast and profound discipline... There is an almost infinite number of things one can learn. I am glad to have had you by my side during my training. Haha, I believe I've grasped the basics now. I daresay you'd better be careful when we're sparring together in the future.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: And step!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: And leap!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Flags up!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Flags fly!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: V
voice.desc: Observe!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Break a leg!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Strike as one!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Your grand finale!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: The troupe appreciates any donation.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Hmm... Anything the troupe could use on our journey?

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: No need to stand on ceremony. I'll just take this.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Oof, watch the costume!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Ugh, the curtain's not down yet...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: This script needs a rewrite...

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Thank you... And goodnight...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: A true tragedy...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: The show... Must go on...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Stay in character...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: How embarrassing...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: This isn't stage fighting...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: (Translated) Ahem! Oh, Maestro!

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Hmm, which opera shall we perform today?

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Let's get this show on the road!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Mmm! There's no better feeling than indulging in your favorite food...It's a shame that I can only afford to have a little bite.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Oh, what a magnificent feast! Wait a second, I'll grab us some drinks to accompany the meal.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: I'm sorry... This meal isn't really agreeing with me.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Exit stage right!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: I'll save the show!

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Saldırı</color>
Arka arkaya en fazla 5 mızrak saldırısı yapar.
<color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırı</color>
İleri atılırken belirli miktarda Dayanıklılık harcar ve önündeki düşmanlara hasar verir.
<color=#ffd780>Havadan Saldırı</color>
Havadayken dalışa geçerek yere vurur ve yoluna çıkan düşmanlara Alan Hasarı verir.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Çalışkanlık Öğretisi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Çalışkanlık Rehberi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Çalışkanlık Felsefesi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Küllenmiş Kalp
materials.desc:
A deformed fragment that contains powerful emotions. You obtained this from defeating Signora, who unleashed her original power.
Even tears cannot extinguish the flames. Molten-hot agony and rage rush through her veins, oozing from her tear ducts.
The First Fatuus found her just before her heart could be destroyed by the eternal blaze. He understood that only deeper hate and obsession could quench the fire that devoured her and make her his ally...

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Bilgelik Tacı
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Yun Hanım, sahnede savaşırken rol yapsa da düşmanlarına karşı kendini savunurken gözler önüne serdiği mızrak becerisi gerçektir.
<color=#ffd780>Bas</color>
Mızrağını, bulutları dağıtırcasına savurur ve <color=#ffe699>Toprak Hasarı</color> verir.
<color=#ffd780>Basılı Tut</color>
Gösterişli Açılış duruşuna geçip yük biriktirerek kalkan oluşturur. Hasar Emilimi, Yun Jin'in Maks. Canına göre belirlenir. Tüm Element Hasarlarına ve Fiziksel Hasarlara karşı %150 etkilidir. Kalkan, Element Becerisi tamamen açığa çıkana kadar kullanılabilir.
Beceri kullanıldığında, süresi bittiğinde veya kalkan kırıldığında Yun Jin, yüklü enerjiyi kullanarak saldırır ve <color=#ffe699>Toprak Hasarı</color> verir.
Yük biriktirme süresine göre 1. Seviye veya 2. Seviye Yüklü Saldırı yapar.
Onca yıl süren hazırlıktan sonra sahnedeki o ihtişamlı an.

<color=#ffe699>Toprak Alan Hasarı</color> verir ve yakındaki tüm grup üyeleri Dalgalanan Bulut Bayrağı Düzeni alır.
<color=#ffd780>Dalgalanan Bulut Bayrağı Düzeni</color>
Düşmanlara Normal Saldırı Hasarı verildiğinde Yun Jin'in mevcut Savunmasına bağlı olarak Bonus Hasar verilir.
Bu becerinin etkileri belirli bir süre geçtikten veya belirli sayıda tetiklendikten sonra kaybolur.
Bir Normal Saldırı birden çok düşmana isabet ederse etki, isabet alan düşman sayısına göre birkaç kez tetiklenir. Etkinin tetiklenme sayısı Dalgalanan Bulut Bayrağı Düzenine sahip her grup üyesi için ayrıca hesaplanır.
Davul sesleri eşliğinde kılıçlar ve mızraklar çarpışırken kudretli bir general boy gösterir.
Sahnedeki enstrümanların coşkusuyla bu iblislerin hakkından nasıl gelindiğini görün!
Yun Jin saldırıya uğradığında <color=#ffd780>Gösterişli Açılış</color> doğru anda kullanılırsa 2. Seviye Yüklü (Basılı Tutma) formu ortaya çıkar.

<color=#ffd780>Dalgalanan Bulut Bayrağı Düzeni</color> becerisinin verdiği Normal Saldırı Hasarı Bonusu, ek olarak grupta sırasıyla 1/2/3/4 Element Türü karakter olduğu zaman Yun Jin'in Savunmasının %2,5/%5/%7,5/%11,5 oranı kadar artar.
Macera ile ilgili etkilere sahip olan bir yemek Mükemmel Pişirildiğinde elde edilen ürün %12 ihtimalle iki katına çıkar.

materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Prithiva Topazı Tozu
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Parlak Zambak
materials.desc: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Prithiva Topazı Kırıntısı
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

materials.name: Uçurum Amblemi
materials.desc:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

materials.name: Uçurum Amblemi
materials.desc:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

materials.name: Parlak Zambak
materials.desc: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Prithiva Topazı Külçesi
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

materials.name: Uçurum Amblemi
materials.desc:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

value.text: 小岩井ことり & Yang Yang

value.name: Bulut Kaplı Yeşim
value.desc: Yun Jin's specialty. This sweet and sticky snack will somehow not affect your throat in any negative way, which is why it's Yun Jin's favorite. The aftertaste is most elegant, not something one would get sick of quickly. Come to think of it... This is quite a decent bit more than she would usually make for herself — but who are you to question her kindness?

customize.name: Beyaz Püskül
customize.desc: Taşordu askerlerinin beylik silahı. Sağlam ve sivri ucuyla güvenilir bir silah.

customize.text:
Beyaz Püskül
Beyaz Püskül'ün İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Kritik Hasarı</color> , Pasif Özelliği de <color=#ffe699>Normal Saldırı Hasarını</color> artırır. Kolay elde edilir ve daha iyi seçenekleriniz yoksa iyi bir geçiş seçeneği.
Kaynak: Liyue'deki Hazine Sandıklarından elde edilebilir.
<color=#ffffff>4 Yıldızlı Silah(lar)</color>

customize.name: Yakalayan Mızrak
customize.desc: Uzun zaman önce ünlü bir Inazuma haydudunun en sevdiği silahıydı.

customize.text:
Yakalayan Mızrak
Yakalayan Mızrak'ın İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> , Pasif Özelliği de Hasar ve <color=#ffe699>Element Patlamasının Kritik Oranını</color> artırır. Yun Jin'in Enerji Yüklemesine yardımcı olur ve çoğu ekip düzenleriyle uygundur.
Kaynak: Inazuma Balıkçılık Derneği'nden alınır.

customize.name: Favonius Mızrağı
customize.desc: Genelde Favonius Şövalyeleri tarafından kullanılan bir mızrak. Düz sapının ucundaki bıçak hafif bir rüzgar gibi salınır.

customize.text:
Favonius Mızrağı
İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> artırır ve Pasif özelliği tetiklendiğinde karakterin <color=#ffe699>Element Enerjisi</color> kurtarılır. Hem kuşanan karakterin hem de partideki diğer karakterlerin Enerji Yüklemesine yardımcı olur ama Kritik Hasara ihtiyaç duyar. Çoğu ekip düzenlemesiyle uyumludur.
Kaynak: Dilek

customize.name: Kitain Haç Mızrağı
customize.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

customize.text:
Kitain Haç Mızrağı
İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Element Ustalığını</color> artırırken Pasif Özelliği tetiklendiğinde karakterin <color=#ffe699>Element Enerjisi</color> kurtarılır ve <color=#ffe699>Element Becerisi Hasarı</color> artar. Yun Jin'in Enerji Yüklemesine yardımcı olur. Çoğu ekip düzenlemesiyle uyumludur.
Kaynak: Üretim

customize.name: Prototip: Yıldız Parıltısı
customize.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

customize.text:
Prototip Yıldız Parıltısı
İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> artırır ve Pasif Özelliği Element Becerisi kullanıldıktan sonra <color=#ffe699>Normal</color> ve <color=#ffe699>Yüklü Saldırı Hasarını</color> artırır. Yun Jin'in Enerji Yüklemesine yardımcı olur ve Hasarını artırır. Çoğu ekip düzenlemesiyle uyumludur.
Kaynak: Üretim
<color=#ffffff>5 Yıldızlı Silah(lar)</color>

customize.name: Hapseden Yıldırım
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.text:
Hapseden Yıldırım
İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> artırır, Pasif Özelliği de <color=#ffe699>Saldırı</color> ve <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> artırır. Bolca Enerji Yüklemesi sağlar ve Yun Jin'e bu konuda yardımcı olurken aynı zamanda Hasarını da artırır. Çoğu ekip düzeniyle uyumludur.
Kaynak: Silah Etkinlik Dileği

customize.name: Göklerin Omurgası
customize.desc: Dvalin'in amansız kararlılığını simgeleyen bir mızrak. Rüzgarın ve gökyüzünün gücünü taşıyan bu silahın dimdik sapı gökleri işaret ediyor.

customize.text:
Göklerin Omurgası
İkinci Özelliği <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesini</color> artırır, Pasif Özelliği ise <color=#ffe699>Kritik Oran</color> ve <color=#ffe699>Normal Saldırı Hızını</color> arıtır ve tetiklendiğinde Ek Hasar verme ihtimali vardır. Eşit Enerji Yüklemesi ve Hasar verir, Yun Jin'in Element Patlaması'nın rotasyonunu geliştirir.
Kaynak: Dilek

Bereketli Rüyaların Hatıraları x4
2'li Set Etkisi: <color=#ffe699>Savunma</color> %30 artar.
4'lü Set Etkisi: Bu Yadigar setini kuşanan bir karakter, şu durumlarda Merak Etkisi kazanır: Savaş alanındayken karakter düşmanı bir Toprak saldırısıyla vurursa 1 kademe kazanır, 0,3 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir. Karakter savaş alanında değilken, her 3 saniyede 1 kademe kazanır. 4 kademeye kadar Merak birikebilir, her bir kademe %6 <color=#ffe699>Savunma</color> ve %6 <color=#ffe699>Toprak Hasar Bonusu</color> kazandırır. Bir Merak kademesi kazanılmadan 6 saniye geçtiğinde, 1 kademe kaybedilir.
Kaynak: Uyku Bahçesi, Savaş başına 20 reçine

Parçalanan Kader Emblemi x2
Bereketli Rüyaların Hatıraları 2'li Set Etkisi: <color=#ffe699>Savunma</color> %30 artar.
Parçalanan Kader Emblemi 2'li Set Etkisi: <color=#ffe699>Enerji Yüklemesi</color> %20 artar.
2+2 set bonusları daha kolay elde edilir, ve bu set hem <color=#ffffff73>Savunma</color> hem de <color=#ffffff73>Enerji Yüklemesi</color> Bonusu içerdiğinden Yun Jin için mükemmel bir seçimdir.
Kaynak: Uyku Bahçesi, savaş başına 20 reçine; Kırmızı Bahçe, savaş başına 20 reçine

Asil Minnettarlık x4
2'li Set Etkisi: Element Patlaması Hasarı %20 artar.
4'lü Set Etkisi: Bir Element Patlaması kullanıldığında tüm grup üyelerinin Saldırısı 12 saniye boyunca %20 artar. Bu etki birikemez.
Kaynak: Berrak Gölet ve Dağ Manzarası, savaş başına 20 reçine; Macera Seviyesi Ödülü; Mistik Adak

Arkaik Taşlar x4
2'li Set Etkisi: <color=#ffe699>Toprak Hasarı Bonusu</color> %15 artar.
4'lü Set Etkisi: Kristalleştirme Tepkimesi ile bir Element Parçası elde edildiğinde, 10 saniyeliğine tüm grup üyeleri o element için %35 Hasar Bonusu kazanır. Bu yöntemle aynı anda yalnızca 1 tür Element Hasarı Bonusu kazanılabilir.
Kaynak: Guyun Zindanı, savaş başına 20 reçine; Mistik Adak

desc.text:
Thank you for your support. How was the song? I'd love to hear what you think about it.
It is thanks to everyone's love and support that my opera skills has continued to improve.
As it is my birthday, the audience have come especially to wish me well. I shall respond in kind by putting on the best show I can.
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4876955

"How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales."
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/4876954

Heyu Tea House has been a popular leisure spot for the people of Liyue.
Its business thrives on two things, one of them being its boss Fan Er'ye's business acumen in inviting a top-notch Tea Master who tells the best stories of all.
Besides that, there is also the performance of the acclaimed troupe, Yun-Han Opera Troupe. Its director and soul — a famed opera singer named Yun Jin — takes the stage at the tea house from time to time.
While one can always get delicious delicacies or good storytelling as long as one knows where to look, Yun Jin's performance does not just await one there.
As a result, you can always find fans of Yun Jin trying their luck at Heyu Tea House. While waiting for Yun Jin's performance, they discuss her past performances and how they feel about them.
As such, more people frequent the tea house, with nine out of ten of them being Yun Jin's fans.
Fan Er'ye couldn't be more satisfied with this state of affairs.

Liyue Opera is one of the traditional arts of Liyue that has been passed down for generations.
Liyue Opera enjoys a long history, and it has gone through quite some changes from what it was originally created to be.
The good thing is, the Liyue Opera we see now retains the sophisticated-sounding vocals and richly varied melodies of old.
Liyue Opera performers usually perform in troupes, and the most acclaimed one of them is the Yun-Han Opera Troupe.
For generations, the troupe has been run by the historic house of Yun, and its current director is a prominent figure in Liyue Harbor — the opera singer Yun Jin.
Yun Jin made her name at a young age when she stunned her audience with a sweet voice and lively costumes in her debut performance.
The more she performs, the better-honed her animated and dynamic style becomes.
Whether it's a delicate and dignified young lady or a mighty and honorable heroine, she can play any role.
What's even rarer is that this young actress is also a playwright. Other than "The Divine Damsel of Devastation," the Yun-Han Opera Troupe has performed many other new plays in recent years, all of which were written by Yun Jin.
With her superb skill, it is no wonder why long-time opera fans often visit Heyu Tea House to ask about Yun Jin's performance schedule when their starving ears demand good opera singing.

Yun Jin was born in a family of Liyue Opera performers.
Her father is a playwright, and her mother used to be a famous opera singer in Liyue Harbor, taking up the mantle from Yun Jin's grandfather.
In such an environment, Yun Jin was exposed to Liyue Opera at a very early age, often amusing herself by echoing her mother's singing.
A childhood hobby, as many would tend to believe, seems unlikely to be developed into a lifelong career, yet Yun Jin proved to be an exception.
She was serious about it and insisted on learning the art.
Her parents were delighted to see their daughter's determination and imparted everything they knew about the Liyue Opera to her. As such, Yun Jin started learning the opera early.
However, Liyue Opera is a complex art that takes years of perfection to master.
So even for a child as gifted as Yun Jin, what awaited her was sweat and tears. While ordinary children might shy away from the pain of hamstring stretches and the tedium of memorizing lyrics, little Yun Jin hung tough and became quite accomplished.
By the time she finished all the subjects in Liyue Opera, veterans of Yun-Han Opera Troupe who watched her grow up couldn't help but exclaim,
"Yet another rising opera star is about to shine upon Liyue Harbor!"

Many veterans of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe first joined the troupe when Yun Jin's grandfather was in charge.
They have remained committed since Yun Jin took the troupe over.
Their love for the art of Liyue Opera is so deep — perhaps even to an excessive degree — that they frown upon any other forms of music performance, including rock 'n' roll.
Yun Jin, however, thinks otherwise. She finds that rock 'n' roll vibrates with vigor and even became friends with the rock 'n' roll musician Xinyan.
Elders of the troupe are glad to follow Yun Jin's lead during rehearsals, but when it comes to daily life, they treat her like their little granddaughter.
"Sweetie, listen to us. No spicy food, it hurts your voice. Meat is fine, but refrain from eating too much, or you will put on weight."
"If you really can't help yourself, have more shrimp. Stay away from the... roll 'n' roll thing. All they know is yelling."
These caring elders will nag Yun Jin about attending rock 'n' roll performance for hours on end.
Faced with the impossible mission of persuading stubborn granddads and grannies, Yun Jin has to be creative.
While it's not an option to go to Xinyan's performance, it's perfectly acceptable to visit Fan Er'ye's adopted daughter Xingyan and discuss Liyue Opera with her.
The elders are not fond of the rock star Xinyan, but they have taken a shine to Xingyan the adopted daughter of Fan Er'ye.
"I've heard that Xingyan can cook and do embroidery. She must be a polite and accomplished young lady. Yun Jin may be able to pick up a thing or two from hanging out with her. How capital!"
Yun Jin has long got Fan Er'ye to agree on the details concerning the made-up Xingyan, so don't worry. No one's gonna call her out on this!

Yun Jin goes by many names. To some, she is Director Yun, and to others, Sir Yun.
They call her Director Yun for her leadership of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe. Though there are managers to help with everyday work, Yun Jin is the one who makes the big decisions. She thus earned the name of Director Yun from people in business circles.
As for Sir Yun, that is another story.
When Yun Jin's grandfather was in charge of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe, long-time fans respectfully addressed him as Sir Yun. After Yun Jin took charge later, these fans frequented her performances as well.
There was once after a show when an impressed fan half-joked with others, "the Sir Yun we have now sings rather well too."
A voice from the crowd immediately countered by saying: "How can you address a young girl as Sir?"
Upon hearing this, Yun Jin curved her lips.
"Those who were born early, learn early. They are naturally better-informed than others. It's every bit right for them to be referred to as Sirs."
"But one doesn't have to be old to be knowledgeable. Besides, why can't a girl be knowledgeable?"
"You are quick in mind and speech, and are thus qualified to be called Sir. I have answered your eminent question — that also makes me a Sir."
Her remarks impressed the fans present, who shared this story to many. In the end, everyone followed the trend and started to call her Sir Yun whether they had or had not met her in person.

Many traditional Liyue Operas revolve around the theme of the adepti and Rex Lapis himself.
A prime example would be "The Divine Damsel of Devastation." People are full of wonderful fantasies about the adepti and would like to see the representation of their joy and anger on stage. Thus, stories portraying them make up the majority of the repertoire of Liyue Opera.
When Yun Jin was young, she would find these stories engaging, but having exhausted every adeptal legend in her performing career, her take on theming gradually changed.
Why not experiment with other themes? For instance... stories of our own, perhaps?
Stories that tell of our earthly joys and sorrows, songs that sing of the hatreds and passions of humanity.
Maybe these stories of mere mortals may not make it as classics of Liyue Opera, but there will always be some people who remember them.
In love our thoughts linger, in rage our hearts burn, and in obsession, our minds go astray. These emotions, good or bad, lift the veil that covers our feelings and souls.
Yun Jin is no adeptus. She can never put herself in the shoes of the adepti, yet she is endowed with the most accurate and sensitive grasp of human emotions.
"So, let me sing of human stories. May my brush be the brush of all hearts and my voice the voice of all souls."
This is the unspoken wish that Yun Jin has so far only kept to herself.

Her ancestors used to work as weaponsmiths instead of opera performers.
Later, someone in the family who was tired of weapon forging grew an interest in the performing arts. By the time it came to Yun Jin's generation, few of the Yuns still practiced the art of forging.
Many forged things have been passed down, though. The lock-shaped copper pendant that Yun Jin carries with her is one such item.
In her childhood, she often practiced dancing for a whole day under the scorching heat of the sun. Sometimes, she would even faint from the exhaustion.
Her parents' hearts ached for her, but they knew well that she had to go through such things to lay a solid foundation.
So instead of stopping her, they gave Yun Jin the lock in the hopes that it would keep fortune and health within her.
Since then, the lock has never left Yun Jin's side. Before every performance, it is a routine for Yun Jin to reminisce about those days of bittersweet training by cleaning the lock with great care.
It feels as if she was caressing the devoted heart of the little Yun Jin who was learning the opera.

Shortly after Yun Jin's debut, Yun Jin quickly got the hang of stage performance through dozens of shows and her great intelligence.
At the time, her appearance meant a whole night of applause for a performance. However, the more she played, the more she felt at a loss — these were not the operas she wanted to perform.
In every opera, the pitch and tempo would invariably go either up or down to indicate drama or doldrum.
As time passed by, the visage of the various characters seemed to blend and blur.
The music would come on, followed by a neat dance, and then her sweet voice. The girl in "The Divine Damsel of Devastation" seemed no different from the fisherman's daughter in "String of Pearls."
While the audience did not object, Yun Jin was not satisfied. "Is skillful singing and dancing all it takes to tell a moving tale?"
What broke her bottleneck was an opera named "Snow Treading."
It was a monodrama about a strenuous walk in the snow. It happened to be a snowy day when Yun Jin first performed the opera.
Having gone astray in the snow, the character felt lost and lamented her helplessness. Somehow, the snow in the story seemed to fall into reality. Yun Jin, who had also found herself adrift, felt as if she had become her character.
That was what she had been looking for, the feeling of leaving herself behind and walking in the shoes of the many characters she played.
To breathe, to live, and to smile just like them.
That was the opera she had wanted to sing, the story she had wanted to tell — one about true emotions, a world built on tens of thousands of individuals who live lives of their own.
Yun Jin could no longer recall how she returned backstage after the epiphany. All she knew was that when she finally had time to take off her costume, she found a Vision in her sleeve.

imgDesc.text:
Orijinal Kıyafet - Bulut Örtüsü
Yun Jin'in giysisi. Feiyun Ticaret Loncasının becerikli terzileri tarafından tasarlandı. Yun Jin, bu giysiye ilk görüşte aşık oldu ve bunu artık en sevdiği gündelik kıyafeti olarak görüyor.
